title: Youkai Navi Runa, Vol. 01
description: THE LEGENDARY CHILD As a baby, Runa Rindô was left in front of a school for foster children, wearing a mysterious pendant. Now she’s in fourth grade and strange things are starting to happen around her. It’s only a matter of time before she discovers her secret powers—and her quest as the Legendary Fairy Child begins! Includes special extras after the story!
author: Michiyo Kikuta
